review: The UI is horrible. It's not at all what I had expected. I feel like some people may love this UI but for how I would want to use the device it is not great. i am more interested in using slingtv and netflix and games and these do not take precedence at all in the UI. it's all about movies and TV shows. The stuff I care about has horrible organization. It takes way to many clicks to get to were I want to go.Another thing, the quallity of the voice remote is not great. I may have a bad one though. The button does not seem to be debounced properly. That is the technical term for I click the button once, and it thinks I clicked it many times. It starts going way past where I wanted it to go when I am navigating.
author: Kirk
